member.name: P:C1.Android.Calendar.C1Calendar.DayOfWeekFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format string which is used for representing day of week names.
member.remarks:
Possible values are:
d S, M, T, W, T, F, S
dd Su, Mo, Tu, We, Th, Fr, Sa
ddd Sun, Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri, Sat
dddd Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday

member.summary: Settings of the animation performed when the current view changes.

member.name: P:C1.Android.Calendar.CalendarViewModeAnimation.AnimationMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the kind of animation used to change .

member.name: P:C1.Android.Calendar.CalendarViewModeAnimation.EasingIn
member.summary: Gets or sets the easing funtion used to interpolate the values of the animation.

member.name: P:C1.Android.Calendar.CalendarViewModeAnimation.EasingOut
member.summary: Gets or sets the easing funtion used to interpolate the values of the animation.

member.name: P:C1.Android.Calendar.CalendarViewModeAnimation.ScaleFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets the scale factor used in the animation.

member.name: T:C1.Android.Calendar.CalendarViewModeAnimationMode
member.summary: Represent the different kinds of animations when changing .

member.name: F:C1.Android.Calendar.CalendarViewModeAnimationMode.Zoom
member.summary: The animation will bring the view backwards or forward depending on which view is being set.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Calendar.CalendarViewModeAnimationMode.ZoomOutIn
member.summary: The animation will zoom out the current view and zom in the new one.
